arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner hits back at Liverpool claim after Crystal Palace win - 'It is disrespectful'
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner says it would be disrespectful of Liverpool's players to say his Crystal Palace side beat a weakened team at Anfield

arts.ttl: Arne Slot is at risk of repeating Brendan Rodgers' mistake after team selection gamble went badly wrong against Crystal Palace, writes DOMINIC KING after another torrid Anfield showing
arts.sum: DOMINIC KING AT ANFIELD: This might be unchartered territory for Arne Slot but, with Liverpool, there is always a reference point - even when the roof is falling in.

arts.ttl: Liverpool make Arne Slot sack decision after Crystal Palace defeat
arts.sum: Liverpool have reportedly reaffirmed their support for Arne Slot despite a miserable run of form that has seen the reigning Premier League champions lose six of their last seven games and crash out of the Carabao Cup. arts.ttl: Slot's silver lining: Liverpool receive injury boost after Palace EFL Cup defeat
arts.sum: Liverpool receive a silver lining after their 3-0 EFL Cup loss to Crystal Palace, as Arne Slot reveals that an injured star has a "good chance" of coming back for the weekend's Premier League clash with Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp hits out at Arne Slot's 'BIG mistake' following Liverpool's crushing defeat by Crystal Palace as boss bemoans lack of depth despite ¬£450m summer spend
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Jamie Redknapp has criticised Arne Slot for his 'big mistake' in team selection after Liverpool 's 3-0 Carabao Cup defeat by Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot serenaded with ‚Äòsacked‚Äô chants by Crystal Palace fans as Liverpool crisis worsens
arts.sum: Liverpool are on a run of six losses in their last seven, all coming on English soil

arts.ttl: Arne Slot's biggest mistake against Crystal Palace wasn't the starting XI, it was something far worse - opinion
Sarr strikes twice as Palace punish Slot's 'surprising' Liverpool selection
arts.sum: Liverpool suffered defeat once again - but it was Arne Slot's 'surprising' team selection which helped Crystal Palace to an easy 3-0 victory at Anfield and a place in the Carabao Cup quarter-finals.
